discover_best_chefs: Discover the Best Chefs Near You
discover_best_chefs_desc: Experience authentic, homemade meals prepared with passion by local chefs.
wait_for_chefs: Check back soon as new chefs are joining!
customer_login_desc: Access your account to manage your orders.
chef_login_desc: Access your dashboard to manage your menu and orders.
customer_signup_desc: Join our community of food lovers.
chef_signup_desc: Share your culinary passion and earn.
validation_email_must_start_with_letter: Email must start with a letter.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
auth_incorrect_credentials: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
auth_email_in_use: This email address is already in use.
auth_password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include uppercase, lowercase, a number, and a symbol.
new_chef_bio: Passionate chef specializing in {{specialty}} cuisine. Ready to bring delicious homemade food to your table!
no_new_orders: No new orders at the moment.
no_ongoing_orders: No orders are currently in progress.
no_completed_orders: You haven't completed any orders yet.
menu_management_desc: Add, edit, and manage the dishes you offer to customers.
your_menu_is_empty_desc: Start by adding your first dish to attract customers.
this_chef_has_no_dishes: This chef has no dishes available at the moment.
no_reviews_for_dish: Be the first to review this dish!
chef_is_currently_closed_desc: This chef is not accepting new orders right now. Please check back later.
login_required_desc: Please log in or create an account to place an order.
delivery_information_desc: This is where your order will be delivered.
chef_is_busy_desc: The chef is currently handling many orders. Your order will be added to the queue and prepared as soon as they're available.
order_error_desc: Please log in and ensure you have a delivery address set in your profile.
order_sent_toast_waitlisted_desc: Your order for {{quantity}}x {{dishName}} has been added to the waitlist!
order_sent_toast_review_desc: Your order for {{quantity}}x {{dishName}} is now under review by the chef.
track_your_current_orders: Track your current orders and see their status.
view_past_orders: View your past orders and re-order your favorites.
no_orders_yet: You haven't placed any orders yet.
no_orders_yet_desc: Find a dish you like and place your first order!
bio_placeholder: Tell customers a little about yourself and your cooking.
profile_updated_desc: Your information has been saved successfully.
update_error_desc: There was a problem saving your changes.
pending_orders_desc: There are {{count}} orders in your queue waiting for you.
logout_desc: This will log you out of your account.
dish_description_placeholder: A brief, enticing description of your dish.
price_positive: Price must be a positive number.
prep_time_positive: Preparation time must be a positive number.
must_be_chef: You must be a chef to perform this action.
delete_dish_warning: This will permanently delete '{{name}}' from your menu. This cannot be undone.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_update: You must be logged in to update your profile.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_change_passwor: You must be logged in to change your password.
change_password_desc: Create a new, strong password that you don't use for other websites.
password_changed_toast_desc: Your password has been updated successfully.
password_change_failed_toast_desc: There was a problem changing your password.
coupon_management_desc: Create and manage discount coupons for your customers.
no_coupons_desc: Create your first coupon to boost your sales!
coupon_code_min_length: Code must be at least 3 characters.
usage_limit_min: Usage limit must be at least 1.
specific_dishes_desc: Choose which dishes this coupon applies to.
select_one_dish_for_specific: You must select at least one dish for specific coupons.
no_dishes_to_add: You don't have any dishes to add to a coupon yet.
end_date_after_start_date: End date must be after start date.
coupon_invalid_error: This coupon code is not valid.
coupon_limit_reached_error: This coupon has reached its usage limit.
coupon_not_applicable_error: This coupon is not applicable to the items in your order.
new_order_notification_desc: You have a new order for {{dishName}} from {{customerName}}.
order_confirmed_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} has been confirmed and is being prepared.
order_ready_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} is ready and will be out for delivery soon.
order_on_the_way_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} is out for delivery.
order_delivered_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} has been delivered. Enjoy your meal!
order_rejected_notification_desc: Unfortunately, your order for {{dishName}} was rejected by the chef.
order_waitlisted_notification_desc: The chef is busy, but your order for {{dishName}} has been added to the queue.
new_waitlisted_order_notification_desc: {{customerName}} placed an order, but you were busy. It's been added to your queue.
community_chat_desc: Chat with other food lovers in the community!
no_messages_yet: No messages yet. Start the conversation!
must_be_customer_to_chat: You must be a customer to access the community chat.
inappropriate_language_detected_desc: Your message could not be sent. Please respect our community guidelines.
password_db_desc: This page displays all registered users and is for demonstration purposes only.
name: Name
forgot_password_desc_sent: If an account exists for that email, a password reset link has been sent.
forgot_password_desc_initial: Enter your email to receive a password reset link.
feature_unavailable_desc_localstorage: This feature is not available in the local storage demo version of the app.
status_management_desc: Share a photo or short video with your customers for 24 hours.
no_active_status_desc: Share a picture of your new dish or a special offer!
caption_placeholder: Describe today's dish, announce a special...
media_is_required: Please upload an image or video.
file_too_large_desc: File size must be less than {{size}}.
delete_status_warning: This will permanently delete this status. This action cannot be undone.
camera_access_denied_desc: Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings to use this feature.
reactions_on_your_status_desc: See who has reacted to your latest status.
no_reactions_yet_desc: When customers react, their reactions will show up here.
